short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension simply shares the moderators desktop view through the OpenTok (http://tokbox.com/) video streaming API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simply provides desktop screen sharing capability for moderators of the QT2 chat room, which is accessible only to QT2 athletes.
